trans-unit.source: Represents an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: You can use this class to load, validate, edit, add, and position XML in a document.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個類別來載入、 驗證、 編輯、 加入和置放 XML 文件中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocument" name="XmlDocument" href=""></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlImplementation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocument" name="XmlDocument" href=""></xref>類別具有指定<xref href="System.Xml.XmlImplementation"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlImplementation" name="XmlImplementation" href=""></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlImplementation" name="XmlImplementation" href=""></xref> to use.

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocument" name="XmlDocument" href=""></xref>指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>類別

trans-unit.target: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNameTable" name="XmlNameTable" href=""></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: Gets the base URI of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前節點的基底 URI。

trans-unit.source: A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places.
trans-unit.target: 網路的 XML 文件由使用各種 W3C 標準包含機制彙總的資料區塊組成，因此包含來自不同位置的節點。

trans-unit.source: The `BaseURI` tells you where these nodes came from.
trans-unit.target: `BaseURI`會告訴您這些節點的來源。

trans-unit.source: For Document nodes, `BaseURI` returns the location of the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 文件節點`BaseURI`傳回的 XML 文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the `XmlDocument` was loaded using the following call doc.Load("http://server/mydata.xml"), the `BaseURI` for the document node is http://server/mydata.xml.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`XmlDocument`使用下列呼叫文件已載入。負載 (「 http://server/mydata.xml 」)`BaseURI`文件節點是 http://server/mydata.xml。

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A> method is redirected by server to a different URI, `BaseURI` returns the original URI passed to the `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A>方法會被重新導向至不同的 URI，伺服器`BaseURI`傳回傳遞至與原始 URI`Load`方法。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: For additional information on `BaseURI` and how it behaves with other node types, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.BaseURI%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`BaseURI`以及如何其行為與其他節點型別，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.BaseURI%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.BaseURI%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The location from which the node was loaded.
trans-unit.target: 節點載入的位置。

trans-unit.source: Creates a duplicate of this node.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個節點的複本。

trans-unit.source: This method serves as a copy constructor for nodes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可做為節點的複製建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The cloned node has no parent (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A> returns `null`).
trans-unit.target: 複製的節點有沒有父代 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A>傳回`null`)。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `deep` is `true`, the cloned node includes all the child nodes, otherwise only the `XmlDocument` node is cloned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`deep`是`true`，複製的節點包含所有子節點，否則只有`XmlDocument`節點會複製。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to see how this method behaves on other node types.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法以查看此方法在其他節點型別上的運作方式。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.CloneNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to clone only the node itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>以遞迴方式複製指定的節點; 下的樹狀子目錄<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>至只要複製節點本身。

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocument" name="XmlDocument" href=""></xref> node.
trans-unit.target: 複製<xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocument" name="XmlDocument" href=""></xref>節點。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> with the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Name*>.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref>與指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Name*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The `XmlAttribute` can be added to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.SetAttributeNode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `XmlAttribute`可以加入至<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.SetAttributeNode%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.SetAttributeNode%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: The qualified name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的限定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the name contains a colon, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Prefix*> property reflects the part of the name preceding the first colon and the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.LocalName*> property reflects the part of the name following the first colon.
trans-unit.target: 如果名稱包含冒號， <> </> *> 屬性會反映第一個冒號之前的名稱部分而<> *> 屬性會反映第一個冒號之後的名稱部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI*> remains empty unless the prefix is a recognized built-in prefix such as xmlns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI*>會保持空白，除非前置詞是可辨識的內建前置詞，例如 xmlns。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI*>

trans-unit.source: In this case <xref uid="langword_csharp_NamespaceURI" name="NamespaceURI" href=""></xref> has a value of http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下<xref uid="langword_csharp_NamespaceURI" name="NamespaceURI" href=""></xref>值為 http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/。

trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref>具有指定限定名稱和<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI*>

trans-unit.target: `XmlAttribute`可以加入至<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.SetAttributeNode%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.SetAttributeNode%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: The qualified name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的限定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the name contains a colon then the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Prefix*> property will reflect the part of the name preceding the colon and the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.LocalName*> property will reflect the part of the name after the colon.
trans-unit.target: 如果名稱包含冒號， <> </> *> 屬性會反映冒號前面的名稱的一部分而<> *> 屬性會反映冒號後面的名稱的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The namespaceURI of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的 namespaceURI。

trans-unit.source: If the qualified name includes a prefix of xmlns, then this parameter must be http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/.
trans-unit.target: 如果限定的名稱包含 xmlns 前置詞，則此參數必須是 http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/。

trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref>具有指定<> *>， <> </> *>，和<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI*>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI*>

trans-unit.source: The prefix of the attribute (if any).
trans-unit.target: 屬性 （如果有的話） 的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: If `prefix` is xmlns, then this parameter must be http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/; otherwise an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`prefix`為 xmlns，這個參數必須是 http: //www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/，否則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlCDataSection"></xref> containing the specified data.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Xml.XmlCDataSection"></xref>包含指定的資料。

trans-unit.source: Although this method creates the new object in the context of the document, it does not automatically add the new object to the document tree.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這個方法會在文件的內容中建立新的物件，它不會自動將新的物件至文件樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: To add the new object, you must explicitly call one of the node insert methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入新的物件，您必須明確呼叫其中一個節點插入方法。

trans-unit.source: According to the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 recommendation (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210), CDataSection nodes are allowed within Element nodes and in EntityReference nodes when the EntityReference node is not a child of an Attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 根據 W3C 可延伸標記語言 (XML) 1.0 recommendation (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210) CDataSection 節點時，允許在項目節點和 EntityReference 節點 EntityReference 節點不是屬性節點的子系。

trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Xml.XmlComment"></xref>包含指定的資料。

trans-unit.source: Although this method creates the new object in the context of the document, it does not automatically add the new object to the document tree.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這個方法會在文件的內容中建立新的物件，它不會自動將新的物件至文件樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: To add the new object, you must explicitly call one of the node insert methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入新的物件，您必須明確呼叫其中一個節點插入方法。

trans-unit.source: According to the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 recommendation (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210), Comment nodes are only allowed within Document, Element and EntityReference nodes, when the EntityReference node is not a child of an Attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 根據 W3C 可延伸標記語言 (XML) 1.0 recommendation (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210) 中，註解節點時，才允許文件、 元素和 EntityReference 節點內 EntityReference 節點不是屬性節點的子系。

trans-unit.target: 新的內容<xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlComment" name="XmlComment" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocumentFragment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: DocumentFragment nodes cannot be inserted into a document.
trans-unit.target: DocumentFragment 節點無法插入至文件。

trans-unit.source: However, you can insert children of the DocumentFragment node into a document.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以將 DocumentFragment 節點的子節點插入文件。

trans-unit.source: The returned node will have parsed <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Entities%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Notations%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的節點將有剖析<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Entities%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Notations%2A>集合。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Notations%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentType.Entities%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although this method creates the new object in the context of the document, it does not automatically add the new object to the document tree.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這個方法會在文件的內容中建立新的物件，它不會自動將新的物件至文件樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: To add the new object, you must explicitly call one of the node insert methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入新的物件，您必須明確呼叫其中一個節點插入方法。

trans-unit.source: According to the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 recommendation (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210), DocumentType nodes are only allowed within Document nodes.
trans-unit.target: 根據 W3C 可延伸標記語言 (XML) 1.0 recommendation (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210) DocumentType 節點之內，才允許文件節點。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> can have only one DocumentType node.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>可以有只有一個 DocumentType 節點。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: The DocumentType node must also be inserted before the root element of the `XmlDocument` (if the document already has a root element, you cannot add a DocumentType node).
trans-unit.target: DocumentType 節點也必須的根項目之前插入`XmlDocument`（如果文件已經有根項目，您無法加入 DocumentType 節點）。

trans-unit.source: If the passed parameters do not combine to build a valid `XmlDocumentType`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳遞的參數不會合併來建置有效`XmlDocumentType`，擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Name of the document type.
trans-unit.target: 文件類型的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The public identifier of the document type or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 文件類型的公用識別項。 或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a public URI and also a system identifier to identify the location of the external DTD subset.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定公用 URI 及系統識別項，以識別外部 DTD 子集的位置。

trans-unit.target: 建立指定之名稱的項目。

trans-unit.source: Note that the instance returned implements the `XmlElement` interface, so default attributes would be created directly on the returned object.
trans-unit.target: 請注意執行個體，傳回實作`XmlElement`介面，以便直接在傳回的物件上建立預設屬性。

trans-unit.source: Although this method creates the new object in the context of the document, it does not automatically add the new object to the document tree.

trans-unit.source: According to the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 recommendation (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210), Element nodes are allowed within Document and Element nodes, and in EntityReference nodes when the EntityReference node is not a child of an Attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 根據 W3C 可延伸標記語言 (XML) 1.0 recommendation (www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-xml-19980210) 中，元素節點時，允許在文件和項目節點和 EntityReference 節點 EntityReference 節點不是屬性節點的子系。

trans-unit.source: The qualified name of the element.

trans-unit.source: If the name contains a colon then the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Prefix*> property reflects the part of the name preceding the colon and the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.LocalName*> property reflects the part of the name after the colon.
trans-unit.target: 如果名稱包含冒號， <> </> *> 屬性會反映冒號前面的名稱部分而<> *> 屬性會反映冒號後面的名稱部分。

trans-unit.source: The qualified name cannot include a prefix of'xmlns'.
trans-unit.target: 限定的名稱不能包含 xmlns 前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The following C# code ``` XmlElement elem; elem=doc.CreateElement("xy:item", "urn:abc"); ``` results in an element that is equivalent to the following XML text.

trans-unit.source: If you append this node as a child of the following node, ``` <item xmlns="urn:1"/> ``` then, at the time of calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.AppendChild%2A>, the parent of the newly created entity reference node is set and the children are expanded in this namespace context.

trans-unit.source: The child nodes of the entity reference remain the same even if you move the entity reference to a place in the document that has a different default namespace context.

trans-unit.source: This does not happen for existing entity reference nodes when you remove and insert them or for entity references that you clone with <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CloneNode%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: The version must be "1.0".
trans-unit.target: 版本必須是"1.0"。

trans-unit.source: The value of the encoding attribute.
trans-unit.target: 編碼屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: This is the encoding that is used when you save the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> to a file or a stream; therefore, it must be set to a string supported by the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> class, otherwise <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save*> fails.
trans-unit.target: 這是您儲存時將使用的編碼方式<xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref>至檔案或資料流中; 因此，它必須設定支援的字串<xref:System.Text.Encoding>類別細明體，否則為<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save*>失敗。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save*> </xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: If this is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or String.Empty, the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Save" name="Save" href=""></xref> method does not write an encoding attribute on the XML declaration and therefore the default encoding, UTF-8, is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或 String.Empty， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Save" name="Save" href=""> </xref>方法不會在 XML 宣告上寫入編碼屬性，因此會使用預設編碼方式 utf-8。

trans-unit.source: Note: If the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocument" name="XmlDocument" href=""></xref> is saved to either a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> or an <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter>, this encoding value is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDocument" name="XmlDocument" href=""></xref>儲存至<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>或<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter>，則會捨棄這個編碼值。</xref:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter> </xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the encoding of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextWriter" name="TextWriter" href=""></xref> or the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlTextWriter" name="XmlTextWriter" href=""></xref> is used.
trans-unit.target: 相反地的編碼方式<xref uid="langword_csharp_TextWriter" name="TextWriter" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlTextWriter" name="XmlTextWriter" href=""></xref>用。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the XML written out can be read back using the correct encoding.
trans-unit.target: 這可以確保，可以使用正確的編碼方式讀寫出的 XML。

trans-unit.source: The value must be either "yes" or "no".
trans-unit.target: 值必須是"yes"no"。

trans-unit.source: If this is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or String.Empty, the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Save" name="Save" href=""></xref> method does not write a standalone attribute on the XML declaration.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或 String.Empty， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Save" name="Save" href=""> </xref>方法不會在 XML 宣告上寫入獨立屬性。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDeclaration" name="XmlDeclaration" href=""></xref> node.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlDeclaration" name="XmlDeclaration" href=""></xref>節點。

trans-unit.source: The values of version or standalone are something other than the ones specified above.
trans-unit.target: 值 version 或 standalone 是上述指定以外的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the root <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> for the document.
trans-unit.target: 取得根<xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref>文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlElement" name="XmlElement" href=""></xref> that represents the root of the XML document tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlElement" name="XmlElement" href=""> </xref>表示 XML 文件樹狀結構的根。

trans-unit.source: If no root exists, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果有根， <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>傳回。

trans-unit.source: Gets the node containing the DOCTYPE declaration.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含 DOCTYPE 宣告的節點。

trans-unit.source: An `XmlDocument` can have one and only one child with <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType> equal to DocumentType.
trans-unit.target: `XmlDocument`可以有只有一個子系<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType>等於 DocumentType。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: To change the DocumentType node, delete the existing node, create a new one using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateDocumentType%2A> method, and add the new node to the document.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更 DocumentType 節點，請刪除現有的節點，建立新一個使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateDocumentType%2A>方法，並將新節點加入至文件。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.CreateDocumentType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> containing the DocumentType (DOCTYPE declaration).
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref>包含 DocumentType （DOCTYPE 宣告）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> with the specified ID.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref>與指定的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: If the document has multiple elements with the matching ID, this method returns the first matching element in the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件有多個具有相符 ID 的項目，這個方法會傳回文件中的第一個相符的項目。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DOM implementation must have information which defines which attributes are of type ID.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > DOM 實作必須擁有這些資訊會定義哪些屬性屬於類型識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Although attributes of type ID can be defined in either XSD schemas or DTDs, this version of the product only supports those defined in DTDs.
trans-unit.target: 雖然型別 ID 的屬性可以定義 XSD 結構描述或 Dtd 中，產品版本只支援 Dtd 中所定義。

trans-unit.source: Attributes with the name "ID" are not of type ID unless so defined in the DTD.
trans-unit.target: 除非因此 DTD 中所定義，具有 「 識別碼 」 不是名稱的屬性類型識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Implementations where it is unknown whether the attributes are of type ID are expected to return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 其中是未知的屬性是否為型別 ID 的實作都應傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The attribute ID to match.
trans-unit.target: 要比對的屬性識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlElement" name="XmlElement" href=""></xref> with the matching ID or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no matching element is found.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlElement" name="XmlElement" href=""> </xref>具有相符 ID 或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找到相符的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> containing a list of all descendant elements that match the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Name*>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>包含符合指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Name*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Name*>之所有子代項目的清單

trans-unit.source: The nodes are placed in the order in which they would be encountered in the document.
trans-unit.target: 節點會放置在其中發生文件中的順序。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is recommended that you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectSingleNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method instead of the GetElementsByTagName method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 建議，您會使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectSingleNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，而不是 GetElementsByTagName 方法。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectSingleNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The qualified name to match.
trans-unit.target: 要比對的限定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: It is matched against the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> property of the matching node.
trans-unit.target: 比對<xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref>相符節點的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The special value "*" matches all tags.
trans-unit.target: 特殊值"*"與所有標記都相符。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> containing a list of all matching nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref>包含所有符合節點的清單。

trans-unit.source: If no nodes match name, the returned collection will be empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有節點符合 name ，傳回的集合將會空白。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> containing a list of all descendant elements that match the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.LocalName*> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI*>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>包含符合指定之所有子代項目的清單<> *> 和<> *>。

trans-unit.source: The nodes are placed in the order in which they would be encountered in the document tree.
trans-unit.target: 節點會放置在其中發生在文件樹狀目錄中的順序。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is recommended that you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectSingleNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method instead of the GetElementsByTagName method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 建議，您會使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectSingleNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，而不是 GetElementsByTagName 方法。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectSingleNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The LocalName to match.
trans-unit.target: 要相符的 LocalName。

trans-unit.source: The special value "*" matches all tags.
trans-unit.target: 特殊值"*"與所有標記都相符。

trans-unit.source: NamespaceURI to match.
trans-unit.target: 要比對的 NamespaceURI。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> containing a list of all matching nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref>包含所有符合節點的清單。

trans-unit.source: If no nodes match the specified localName and namespaceURI, the returned collection will be empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有節點符合指定 localName 和 namespaceURI ，傳回的集合將會空白。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlImplementation"></xref> object for the current document.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Xml.XmlImplementation"></xref>目前文件的物件。

trans-unit.source: `XmlDocument` objects created from the same `XmlImplementation` share the same <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>.
trans-unit.target: `XmlDocument`建立從相同物件`XmlImplementation`共用相同<xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>

trans-unit.source: This allows users to compare attribute and element names as objects rather than strings.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓使用者做為物件，而不是字串比較的屬性和項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: Although the `XmlDocument` objects share the same implementation, to move nodes from one document to another you must use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.ImportNode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 雖然`XmlDocument`物件共用相同的實作，以將節點從一份文件移到另一個則必須使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.ImportNode%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.ImportNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlImplementation" name="XmlImplementation" href=""></xref> object for the current document.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlImplementation" name="XmlImplementation" href=""> </xref>目前文件的物件。

trans-unit.source: Imports a node from another document to the current document.
trans-unit.target: 從其他文件匯入節點至目前的文件。

trans-unit.source: The returned node has no parent.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的節點有沒有父代。

trans-unit.source: The source node is not altered or removed from the original document; `ImportNode` creates a copy of the source node.
trans-unit.target: 來源節點不改變或移除原始文件。`ImportNode`建立來源節點的複本。

trans-unit.source: Importing a node creates an `XmlNode` object owned by the importing document, with <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType%2A> identical to the source node.
trans-unit.target: 匯入的節點會建立`XmlNode`物件與所匯入的文件中，擁有<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType%2A>來源節點相同。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new object also has the attributes related to namespaces (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Prefix%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.LocalName%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 新的物件也有命名空間與相關的屬性 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Prefix%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.LocalName%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI%2A>)。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NamespaceURI%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.LocalName%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.Prefix%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the node type of the imported node and the value of the `deep` parameter, additional information is copied as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 根據節點類型的值匯入的節點以及`deep`參數，其他資訊會適當的複製。

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to mirror the behavior expected if a fragment of XML or HTML source was copied from one document to another (recognizing that, in the XML case, the two documents could have different DTDs).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會嘗試預期的行為，如果 XML 或 HTML 來源的片段從一份文件複製到另一個鏡像 （可辨識在 XML 案例中，兩份文件可能有不同的 Dtd）。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the specific behavior for each <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每個<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType>的特定行為

trans-unit.source: |XmlNodeType|ImportNode(true)|ImportNode(false)| |-----------------|------------------------|-------------------------| |Attribute|The <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute.Specified%2A> property is set to `true` on the generated <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: |XmlNodeType |ImportNode(true) |ImportNode(false) | |-----------------|------------------------|-------------------------| |屬性 |<xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute.Specified%2A>屬性設定為`true`產生<xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute> </xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute.Specified%2A>

trans-unit.source: The descendants of the source `XmlAttribute` are recursively imported and the resulting nodes reassembled to form the corresponding subtree.|The `deep` parameter does not apply to `XmlAttribute` nodes; they always carry their children with them when imported.| |CData|Copies the node, including its data.|Copies the node, including its data.| |Comment|Copies the node, including its data.|Copies the node, including its data.| |DocumentFragment|The descendants of the source node are recursively imported and the resulting nodes reassembled to form the corresponding subtree.|An empty <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentFragment> is generated.| |DocumentType|Copies the node, including its data.*|Copies the node, including its data.*| |Element|The descendants of the source element and its specified attribute nodes are recursively imported and the resulting nodes reassembled to form the corresponding subtree.
trans-unit.target: 來源的下階`XmlAttribute`會遞迴匯入與產生的節點會重組以形成對應的樹狀子目錄。 |`deep`參數不適用於`XmlAttribute`節點; 它們永遠執行具有匯入時及其子系。 | |CData |複製節點，包含其資料。 |複製節點，包含其資料。 | |註解 |複製節點，包含其資料。 |複製節點，包含其資料。 | |DocumentFragment |來源節點的子代會遞迴匯入，而且產生的節點會重組以形成對應的樹狀子目錄。 |產生空<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentFragment>。 | |DocumentType |複製節點，包含其資料。*|複製節點，包含其資料。*| |項目 |來源項目和其指定的屬性節點的子代會遞迴匯入，而且產生的節點會重組以形成對應的樹狀子目錄。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocumentFragment>

trans-unit.source: Note: Default attributes are not copied.
trans-unit.target: 附註︰ 預設不會複製屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the document being imported into defines default attributes for this element name, those are assigned.|Specified attribute nodes of the source element are imported, and the generated `XmlAttribute` nodes are attached to the generated <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>.
trans-unit.target: 如果要匯入的文件定義這個項目名稱的預設屬性，會指派這些。 |指定的屬性節點的來源項目會匯入，以及產生`XmlAttribute`節點會附加至產生<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: Note: Default attributes are not copied.
trans-unit.target: 附註︰ 預設不會複製屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the document being imported into defines default attributes for this element name, those are assigned.| |EntityReference|Because the source and destination documents could have the entities defined differently, this method only copies the <xref:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference> node.
trans-unit.target: 如果要匯入的文件定義這個項目名稱的預設屬性，會指派這些。 | |EntityReference |因為來源和目的文件可以擁有定義不同的實體，這個方法只會複製<xref:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference>節點。</xref:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference>

trans-unit.source: The replacement text is not included.
trans-unit.target: 取代文字就不會包含。

trans-unit.source: If the destination document has the entity defined, its value is assigned.|Because the source and destination documents could have the entities defined differently, this method only copies the <xref:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference> node.
trans-unit.target: 如果目的文件有定義的實體，其值指派。 |因為來源和目的文件可以擁有定義不同的實體，這個方法只會複製<xref:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference>節點。</xref:System.Xml.XmlEntityReference>

trans-unit.source: The replacement text is not included.
trans-unit.target: 取代文字就不會包含。

trans-unit.source: If the destination document has the entity defined, its value is assigned.| |ProcessingInstruction|Copies the target and data value from the imported node.|Copies the target and data value from the imported node.| |Text|Copies the node, including its data.|Copies the node, including its data.| |SignificantWhitespace|Copies the node, including its data.|Copies the node, including its data.| |Whitespace|Copies the node, including its data.|Copies the node, including its data.| |XmlDeclaration|Copies the target and data value from the imported node.|Copies the target and data value from the imported node.| |All other node types.|These node types cannot be imported.|These node types cannot be imported.| *Although DocumentType nodes can be imported, a document can only have one DocumentType.
trans-unit.target: 如果目的文件有定義的實體，其值指派。 | |ProcessingInstruction |從匯入的節點複製目標和資料值。 |從匯入的節點複製目標和資料值。 | |文字 |複製節點，包含其資料。 |複製節點，包含其資料。 | |SignificantWhitespace |複製節點，包含其資料。 |複製節點，包含其資料。 | |空白字元 |複製節點，包含其資料。 |複製節點，包含其資料。 | |XmlDeclaration |從匯入的節點複製目標和資料值。 |從匯入的節點複製目標和資料值。 | |其他所有節點類型。 |無法匯入這些節點型別。 |無法匯入這些節點型別。 | * 雖然 DocumentType 節點可以匯入，文件只能有一個 DocumentType。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定表示目前節點的子系的標記。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property replaces the children of the node with the parsed contents of the given string.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性指定字串的已剖析內容取代節點的子系。

trans-unit.source: The parsing is done in the current namespace context.
trans-unit.target: 剖析會在目前的命名空間內容中完成。

trans-unit.source: `InnerXml` removes redundant namespace declarations.
trans-unit.target: `InnerXml`移除多餘的命名空間宣告。

trans-unit.source: As a result, numerous cut and paste operations do not increase the size of your document with redundant namespace declarations.
trans-unit.target: 結果中，許多剪下和貼上作業不會增加您的文件有多餘的命名空間宣告的大小。

trans-unit.source: Consider the following XSL document: ``` <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:template match="stock"> ... </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> ``` The `InnerXml` property on the stylesheet node returns the following string: ``` <xsl:template match="stock" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> ... </xsl:template> ``` Notice the additional xmlns:xsl namespace declaration which is used to preserve the node identity.
trans-unit.target: 請考量下列 XSL 文件︰ ``` <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> <xsl:template match="stock"> ... </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet> ``` `InnerXml`樣式表節點上的屬性會傳回下列字串︰``` <xsl:template match="stock" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform"> ... </xsl:template> ```請注意其他 xmlns:xsl 命名空間宣告用來保留節點的身分識別。

trans-unit.source: If you re-insert this inner XML string, you will get back your original document.
trans-unit.target: 如果您重新插入此內部的 XML 字串，您將會傳回原始文件。

trans-unit.source: In other words, `InnerXml` recognizes that the xmlns:xsl namespace declaration is redundant, given that the parent xsl:stylesheet element already has the xmlns:xsl namespace delcaration, and therefore removes it.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，`InnerXml`辨識 xmlns:xsl 命名空間宣告為備援，，假設父 xsl: stylesheet 項目已經有 xmlns:xsl 命名空間 delcaration 中，並因此將它移除。

trans-unit.source: If you move `InnerXml` from a document with no default namespace to a document with a default namespace, the behavior is a little different.
trans-unit.target: 如果您移動`InnerXml`稍有不同的行為是預設命名空間加入文件沒有預設命名空間與文件中。

trans-unit.source: Consider the following XML string: ``` <test> <item>123</item> </test> ``` `InnerXml` returns a plain XML string with no namespace declarations: ``` <item>123</item> ``` If you then insert this string into a document that does have a default namespace, such as the following: ``` <test2 xmlns="urn:1"> </test> ``` `InnerXml` parses the string in context, and the new nodes pick up the urn:1 namespace.
trans-unit.target: 請考慮下列的 XML 字串︰ ``` <test> <item>123</item> </test> ``` `InnerXml`傳回純文字 XML 字串有沒有命名空間宣告︰``` <item>123</item> ```如果然後插入具有預設命名空間，如下所示的文件的這個字串︰ ``` <test2 xmlns="urn:1"> </test> ``` `InnerXml`剖析在內容中，字串和新的節點收取 urn:&1; 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The result looks like this: ``` <test2 xmlns="urn:1"> <item>123</item> </test> ``` Now when you ask for the `InnerXml` you get back the following: ``` <item xmlns="urn:1">123</item> ``` If you explicitly want the inserted item to preserve the fact that it came from a document that had no namespace then you need to manually add an xmlns= "" declaration and insert the resulting string: ``` <item xmlns="">123</item> ``` The net effect of all this is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: 結果看起來像這樣︰``` <test2 xmlns="urn:1"> <item>123</item> </test> ```現在當您尋求`InnerXml`您會回到下列︰``` <item xmlns="urn:1">123</item> ```您是否明確插入的項目，以保留它來自已沒有命名空間，則您必須手動加入 xmlns 的文件的事實 =""宣告，並且插入產生的字串︰ ``` <item xmlns="">123</item> ``` ，如下所示這是所有的淨效果︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Cutting and pasting `InnerXml` among documents that do not use namespaces is clean and simple and does not create "xmlns" redundancy in your strings.
trans-unit.target: 剪下和貼上`InnerXml`之間的文件，請勿使用命名空間清楚且簡單，而不會建立"xmlns"備援性在字串中。

trans-unit.source: `InnerXml` can also be used to cut and paste between documents which have more than one namespace (that is XSL stylesheets).
trans-unit.target: `InnerXml`也可以用來剪下並貼上具有一個以上的命名空間 （亦即 XSL 樣式表） 的文件之間。

trans-unit.source: xmlns:xsl declarations automatically appear in your strings and disappear in your node hierarchies.
trans-unit.target: xmlns:xsl 宣告自動出現在您的字串，而且節點階層中消失。

trans-unit.source: In the case where you are moving `InnerXml` from a document that has no default namespace to a document that does have a default namespace, the new nodes will pick up the new default namespace.
trans-unit.target: 在您所移動的情況下`InnerXml`從沒有預設的命名空間的文件沒有預設命名空間的文件中，新的節點會收取新的預設命名空間。

trans-unit.source: If `InnerXml` is set with text containing entity references that are not currently defined in the document, the resulting tree will contain empty EntityReference nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果`InnerXml`設定文字中包含目前未定義文件中的實體參考，結果樹狀結構會包含空白的 EntityReference 節點。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is in the initial state (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> =ReadState.Initial), `Load` consumes the entire contents of the reader and builds the DOM from what it finds.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器中的初始狀態 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> = 為 ReadState.Initial)，`Load`取用讀取器的整個內容，並建置它所找到的 DOM。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the reader is already positioned on some node at depth "n", this method loads that node and all subsequent siblings up to the end tag that closes depth "n".
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器已經位於某個節點的深度"n"，這個方法會載入該節點和所有後續的同層級直到關閉深度"n"的結束標記。

trans-unit.source: This has the following results.
trans-unit.target: 這有下列結果。

trans-unit.source: If the current node and its siblings look like the following: ``` <!--comment--><element1>one</element1><element2>two</element2> ``` `Load` throws an exception because a document cannot have two root level elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前節點和其同層級如下所示︰ ``` <!--comment--><element1>one</element1><element2>two</element2> ``` `Load`擲回例外狀況，因為文件不能有兩個根層級元素。

trans-unit.source: If the current node and its siblings look like the following: ``` <!--comment--><?process instruction?><!--comment--></endtag> ``` `Load` succeeds, but you have an incomplete DOM tree because there is no root level element.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前節點和其同層級看起來類似下列︰ ``` <!--comment--><?process instruction?><!--comment--></endtag> ``` `Load`成功，因為沒有任何根層級元素，但不完整的 DOM 樹狀目錄。

trans-unit.source: Before you save the document, you must add a root level element, otherwise <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A> will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 儲存文件之前，必須將根層級元素，否則<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A>將會擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the reader is positioned on a leaf node that is invalid for the root level of a document, for example a white space or attribute node, the reader continues to read until it is positioned on a node that can be used for the root.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器定位於分葉節點的文件，例如空白字元或屬性節點的根層級而言是無效的讀取器會繼續讀取，直到將其置於可用於在節點上。

trans-unit.source: The document begins loading at this point.
trans-unit.target: 文件會開始載入此時。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable> associated with this implementation.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>與這個實作關聯。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>

trans-unit.source: Each `XmlDocument` object has a <xref:System.Xml.NameTable> object.
trans-unit.target: 每個`XmlDocument`物件具有<xref:System.Xml.NameTable>物件。</xref:System.Xml.NameTable>

trans-unit.source: Element and attribute names are stored in the `NameTable` as atomized strings.
trans-unit.target: 元素和屬性名稱會儲存在`NameTable`原子化字串的形式。

trans-unit.source: This means that even if a name is referenced in the document multiple times it is stored only once in the `NameTable`.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，即使參考文件中的名稱多次它會儲存一次在`NameTable`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the document had multiple elements with the name "Customer", `NameTable` returns the same object whenever it receives a request for that name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果文件有多個名稱為 「 客戶 」 項目`NameTable`傳回相同的物件，每當它接收的要求，該名稱。

trans-unit.source: As a result, users can write code using object comparisons on these strings rather than the more expensive string comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，使用者可以撰寫程式碼使用這些字串，而不是更耗費資源的字串比較的物件比較。

trans-unit.source: For more information on atomized strings, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關原子化字串的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNameTable>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to preserve white space in element content.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否保留項目內容中的空白字元。

trans-unit.source: This property determines how white space is handled during the load and save process.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性決定如何在載入時處理泛空白字元，並儲存程序。

trans-unit.source: If `PreserveWhitespace` is `true` before <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.LoadXml%2A> is called, white space nodes are preserved; otherwise, if this property is `false`, significant white space is preserved, white space is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果`PreserveWhitespace`是`true`之前<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A>或<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.LoadXml%2A>是呼叫，泛空白字元節點會保留; 否則如果這個屬性是`false`保留顯著泛空白字元，空白字元不是。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.LoadXml%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `PreserveWhitespace` is `true` before <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A> is called, white space in the document is preserved in the output; otherwise, if this property is `false`, `XmlDocument` auto-indents the output.
trans-unit.target: 如果`PreserveWhitespace`是`true`之前<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A>是稱為，文件中的泛空白字元是保留在輸出中; 否則如果這個屬性是`false`，`XmlDocument`自動縮排輸出。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to preserve white space; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要保留空白字元。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object based on the information in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>資訊為基礎的物件

trans-unit.source: The reader must be positioned on a node or attribute.
trans-unit.target: 讀取器必須定位在節點或屬性上。

trans-unit.source: Reads one `XmlNode` from the given reader and positions the reader on the next node.
trans-unit.target: 讀取一`XmlNode`從指定的讀取器，並將讀取器置於下一個節點上。

trans-unit.source: This method creates the type of `XmlNode` matching the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType%2A> on which the reader is currently positioned.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法建立的型別`XmlNode`比對<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType%2A>讀取器目前所在。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.NodeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: (If the reader is in the initial state, `ReadNode` advances the reader to the first node and then operates on that node.) If the reader is positioned on the start of an element, `ReadNode` reads all the attributes and any child nodes, up to and including the end tag of the current node.
trans-unit.target: (如果讀取器中的初始狀態，`ReadNode`使讀取器前進至第一個節點，然後在該節點上運作。) 如果讀取器位於項目，開頭`ReadNode`讀取所有屬性和任何子節點，以及目前節點的結束標記。

trans-unit.source: The `XmlNode` returned contains the sub-tree representing everything read.
trans-unit.target: `XmlNode`傳回包含子樹狀結構表示所有項目讀取。

trans-unit.source: The reader is positioned immediately after the end tag.
trans-unit.target: 讀取器定位於結束標記的後面。

trans-unit.source: `ReadNode` can also read attributes, but in this case it does not advance the reader to the next attribute.
trans-unit.target: `ReadNode`也可以讀取屬性，但在此情況下它並不使讀取器前進至下一個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to write the following C# code: ``` XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); while (reader.MoveToNextAttribute()) { XmlNode a = doc.ReadNode(reader); // Do some more processing. } ``` `ReadNode` does consume the attribute value though, which means after calling `ReadNode` on an attribute, <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadAttributeValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您撰寫下列 C# 程式碼︰ ``` XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); while (reader.MoveToNextAttribute()) { XmlNode a = doc.ReadNode(reader); // Do some more processing. } ``` `ReadNode`會耗用屬性值，這表示在呼叫`ReadNode`屬性，<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadAttributeValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>傳回`false`。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadAttributeValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The XML source
trans-unit.target: XML 來源

trans-unit.source: The new <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no more nodes exist.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有其他節點。

trans-unit.source: The reader is positioned on a node type that does not translate to a valid DOM node (for example, EndElement or EndEntity).
trans-unit.target: 讀取器不會轉譯是有效的 DOM 節點 （例如 EndElement 或 EndEntity） 的節點類型上。

trans-unit.source: Saves the XML document to the specified stream.
trans-unit.target: 將 XML 文件儲存至指定的資料流。

trans-unit.source: White space is preserved only if <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.PreserveWhitespace%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 只有當保留空白字元<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.PreserveWhitespace%2A>設`true`。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.PreserveWhitespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XmlDeclaration of the current `XmlDocument` object determines the encoding attribute in the saved document.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 XmlDeclaration`XmlDocument`物件可以決定所儲存的文件中的編碼屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the encoding attribute is taken from the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 編碼屬性的值取自<xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the `XmlDocument` does not have an XmlDeclaration, or if the XmlDeclaration does not have an encoding attribute, the saved document will not have one either.
trans-unit.target: 如果`XmlDocument`並沒有 xml 宣告，或如果 XmlDeclaration 沒有編碼方式的屬性，儲存的文件不會有其中一個是。

trans-unit.source: When the document is saved, xmlns attributes are generated to persist the node identity (local name + namespace URI) correctly.
trans-unit.target: 儲存文件時，會產生 xmlns 屬性正確保存 （區域名稱 + 命名空間 URI） 的節點識別。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following C# code ``` XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.AppendChild(doc.CreateElement("item","urn:1")); doc.Save(Console.Out); ``` generates this xmls attribute `<item xmls="urn:1"/>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列 C# 程式碼``` XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.AppendChild(doc.CreateElement("item","urn:1")); doc.Save(Console.Out); ```會產生此 xml 屬性`<item xmls="urn:1"/>`。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: Note that only the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A> method enforces a well-formed XML document.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，只有<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A>方法會強制語式正確的 XML 文件。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: All other `Save` overloads only guarantee a well-formed fragment.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他`Save`多載只會保證語式正確的片段。

trans-unit.source: The stream to which you want to save.
trans-unit.target: 您要儲存的資料流。

trans-unit.source: The operation would not result in a well formed XML document (for example, no document element or duplicate XML declarations).
trans-unit.target: 作業不會產生格式正確的 XML 文件 （例如，沒有文件項目或重複 XML 宣告）。

trans-unit.source: Saves the XML document to the specified <xref:System.IO.TextWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 將 XML 文件儲存至指定<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The encoding on the `TextWriter` determines the encoding that is written out (The encoding of the XmlDeclaration node is replaced by the encoding of the `TextWriter`).
trans-unit.target: 上的編碼`TextWriter`判斷會寫出的編碼方式 (的編碼方式編碼的 xml 宣告節點取代`TextWriter`)。

trans-unit.source: If there was no encoding specified on the `TextWriter`, the `XmlDocument` is saved without an encoding attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有指定在沒有編碼`TextWriter`、`XmlDocument`儲存沒有編碼方式的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: Note that only the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Save%2A> method enforces a well-formed XML document.

trans-unit.source: Saves the XML document to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 將 XML 文件儲存至指定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the specified file exists, this method overwrites it.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的檔案存在，這個方法會覆寫它。

trans-unit.source: White space is preserved in the output file only if <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.PreserveWhitespace%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 輸出的檔案才會在中，會保留空白字元<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.PreserveWhitespace%2A>設`true`。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.PreserveWhitespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XmlDeclaration of the current `XmlDocument` object determines the encoding attribute in the saved document.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 XmlDeclaration`XmlDocument`物件可以決定所儲存的文件中的編碼屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the encoding attribute is taken from the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 編碼屬性的值取自<xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDeclaration.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the `XmlDocument` does not have an XmlDeclaration, or if the XmlDeclaration does not have an encoding attribute, the saved document will not have one either.
trans-unit.target: 如果`XmlDocument`並沒有 xml 宣告，或如果 XmlDeclaration 沒有編碼方式的屬性，儲存的文件不會有其中一個是。

trans-unit.source: When the document is saved, xmlns attributes are generated to persist the node identity (local name + namespace URI) correctly.
trans-unit.target: 儲存文件時，會產生 xmlns 屬性正確保存 （區域名稱 + 命名空間 URI） 的節點識別。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following C# code ``` XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.AppendChild(doc.CreateElement("item","urn:1")); doc.Save(Console.Out); ``` generates this xmls attribute `<item xmls="urn:1"/>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列 C# 程式碼``` XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.AppendChild(doc.CreateElement("item","urn:1")); doc.Save(Console.Out); ```會產生此 xml 屬性`<item xmls="urn:1"/>`。

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object is initialized with XML data from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> object is loaded from the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Schemas%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> object containing the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas associated with this <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref>; otherwise, an empty <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>物件，其中包含與此相關聯的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述<xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref>，否則為空<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Validates the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> against the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas*> property.
trans-unit.target: 驗證<xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref>中包含的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas*>屬性。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas*>

trans-unit.source: The Validate method validates the XML data in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> against the schemas contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Validate 方法會驗證 XML 資料中的<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>中包含的結構描述<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: The Validate method performs infoset augmentation.
trans-unit.target: Validate 方法執行資訊集增加。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, after successful validation, schema defaults are applied, text values are converted to atomic values as necessary, and type information is associated with validated information items.
trans-unit.target: 具體而言，在驗證成功之後會套用結構描述預設值、 文字值會轉換成在必要時，不可部份完成值和類型資訊已驗證的資訊項目相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The result is a previously un-typed XML sub-tree in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> replaced with a typed sub-tree.
trans-unit.target: 結果是以先前不具型別的的 XML 子樹狀結構中<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>取代具類型的子樹。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the Validate method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用驗證方法時要考慮的重要注意事項。

trans-unit.source: - Schema location hints like `xsi:schemaLocation` or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述位置提示喜歡`xsi:schemaLocation`或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: - Inline schemas are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌結構描述都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: - If schema validation errors occur during validation the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> becomes partially validated with some nodes with correct type information and some without.
trans-unit.target: -如果在驗證期間發生的結構描述驗證錯誤<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>部分會變成驗證與以正確的類型資訊的某些節點有些則沒有。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: - The validation process includes checking for uniqueness and reference constraints (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, and `xs:unique`).
trans-unit.target: -驗證程序包括檢查唯一性和參考條件約束 (`xs:ID`， `xs:IDREF`， `xs:key`， `xs:keyref`，和`xs:unique`)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> object that receives information about schema validation warnings and errors.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref>物件，可接收有關結構描述驗證警告和錯誤的資訊。

trans-unit.source: A schema validation event occurred and no <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> object was specified.
trans-unit.target: 發生結構描述驗證事件，而且沒有<xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref>指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: Validates the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object specified against the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas*> property.
trans-unit.target: 驗證<xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref>物件中包含的 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas*>屬性。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas*>

trans-unit.source: The Validate method validates the XML data in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> object against the schemas contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Validate 方法會驗證 XML 資料中的<xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>物件中包含的結構描述<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Schemas%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: The Validate method performs infoset augmentation.
trans-unit.target: Validate 方法執行資訊集增加。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, after successful validation, schema defaults are applied, text values are converted to atomic values as necessary, and type information is associated with validated information items.
trans-unit.target: 具體而言，在驗證成功之後會套用結構描述預設值、 文字值會轉換成在必要時，不可部份完成值和類型資訊已驗證的資訊項目相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The result is a previously un-typed XML sub-tree in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> replaced with a typed sub-tree.
trans-unit.target: 結果是以先前不具型別的的 XML 子樹狀結構中<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>取代具類型的子樹。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the Validate method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用驗證方法時要考慮的重要注意事項。

trans-unit.source: - Schema location hints like `xsi:schemaLocation` or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述位置提示喜歡`xsi:schemaLocation`或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: - Inline schemas are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌結構描述都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: - If schema validation errors occur during validation the <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> becomes partially validated with some nodes with correct type information and some without.
trans-unit.target: -如果在驗證期間發生的結構描述驗證錯誤<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>部分會變成驗證與以正確的類型資訊的某些節點有些則沒有。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: If the node to validate is the root node, the validation process includes checking for uniqueness and reference constraints (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, and `xs:unique`); otherwise, uniqueness and reference constraints are omitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果要驗證的節點是根節點，驗證程序包括檢查唯一性和參考條件約束 (`xs:ID`， `xs:IDREF`， `xs:key`， `xs:keyref`，和`xs:unique`); 否則會省略唯一性和參考條件約束。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> object that receives information about schema validation warnings and errors.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref>物件，可接收有關結構描述驗證警告和錯誤的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> to use for resolving external resources.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>来用來解析外部資源。

trans-unit.source: The `XmlResolver` can be used to load DTDs or expand entity references.
trans-unit.target: `XmlResolver`可用來載入 Dtd 或擴充實體參考。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver.Credentials%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, you can set credentials on the `XmlResolver` to access resources stored on a secure network resource.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver.Credentials%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，您可以在設定認證`XmlResolver`存取儲存在安全的網路資源上的資源。</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver.Credentials%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - If the document was not loaded using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> (that is, if it was loaded using a stream, file, and so on) the `XmlResolver` on the `XmlDocument` is always used.
trans-unit.target: -如果使用未載入文件<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>（亦即，如果它使用資料流載入，檔案，等等）`XmlResolver`上`XmlDocument`一律使用。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: - If the document was loaded with an <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>, the resolver on the `XmlTextReader` is used to resolve any DTD references in the DocumentType node.
trans-unit.target: -如果文件使用載入<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>，解析`XmlTextReader`用來解析 DTD 中的任何參考 DocumentType 節點。</xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>

trans-unit.source: The resolver on the `XmlDocument` is used to expand any entity references.
trans-unit.target: 在解析程式`XmlDocument`用來展開實體的任何參考。

trans-unit.source: - If the document was loaded with an <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>, the resolver on the `XmlDocument` is never used.
trans-unit.target: -如果文件使用載入<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>，解析`XmlDocument`從未使用過。</xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>

trans-unit.source: - If the document was loaded with a class that extends `XmlReader` and the `XmlReader` cannot resolve entities (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.CanResolveEntity%2A> returns `false`), the `XmlResolver` on the `XmlDocument` is used to resolve any references in the DocumentType node and to expand any entity references.
trans-unit.target: -如果文件已載入與該類別可擴充`XmlReader`和`XmlReader`無法解析實體 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.CanResolveEntity%2A>傳回`false`)、`XmlResolver`上`XmlDocument`用來解析 DocumentType 節點中的任何參考，並展開實體的任何參考。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.CanResolveEntity%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the `XmlDocument` is loaded using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> which had an `XmlResolver` set to it, the `XmlResolver` on the `XmlReader` is not cached by the `XmlDocument` after <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A> completes.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果`XmlDocument`使用載入<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>其中有`XmlResolver`設，`XmlResolver`上`XmlReader`不會快取用`XmlDocument`之後<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A>完成。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.Load%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: In version 1.1 of the.NET Framework, if this property is not set, the trust level of the application determines the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 在 1.1 版的.net Framework，如果未設定這個屬性，應用程式的信任層級會決定預設的行為。

trans-unit.source: `Fully trusted code:` The document uses a default <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: `Fully trusted code:`文件會使用預設值<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>不具使用者認證。</xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>

trans-unit.source: If authentication is required to access a network resource, use the `XmlResolver` property to specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證才能存取網路資源，使用`XmlResolver`屬性來指定`XmlResolver`具有必要認證。

trans-unit.source: `Semi-trusted code:` The `XmlResolver` property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: `Semi-trusted code:``XmlResolver`屬性設定為`null`。

trans-unit.source: External resources are not resolved.
trans-unit.target: 不會解析外部資源。

trans-unit.source: For more information on security and the `XmlResolver` property, see [Resolving External Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關安全性和`XmlResolver`屬性，請參閱[解析外部資源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlResolver" name="XmlResolver" href=""></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlResolver" name="XmlResolver" href=""></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: In version 1.1 of the.NET Framework, the caller must be fully trusted in order to specify an <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlResolver" name="XmlResolver" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在 1.1 版的.net Framework，呼叫端必須是完全信任才能指定<xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlResolver" name="XmlResolver" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> and an external DTD or entity is encountered.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>且遇到外部 DTD 或實體。
